name: @softboxlab/eslint-config-gandalf-lint-vue
description: Your bad code shall not pass (Vue version)

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:tags

author: Lucas Vilaboim <lucas@vilaboim.com>
